verses.roman:
taila bhāṅgi' sei pathe nija-ghara giyā
śuiyā rahilā ghare kapāṭa khiliyā

synonyms: taila bhāṅgi'-breaking the pot of oil; sei—he; pathe—by the path; nija-ghara—to his room; giyā—going; śuiyā rahilā—lay down; ghare—in the room; kapāṭa—the door; khiliyā—bolting closed.
translation: After breaking the jug, Jagadānanda Paṇḍita returned to his residence, bolted the door and lay down.
